channel.title: How do i add items to shops?
channel.description:
hi im using tokkulscape 2.5(mostly because 3.5 got more glitches) and i wanna know how to add items to shops and change the prices can anyone help me?
like a man once said...i have failed at skilling, give me a fruit cake
LMFAO

item.title: How do i add items to shops?
item.dc:creator: @darklord1 darklord1
item.description:
@darklord1 wrote:

the item?

oh yh ty for the help

as a man once said...i have failed at skilling, give me a fruit cake

item.title: How do i add items to shops?
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

the item?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 05:08:24 pm[/size][hr]In item.cfg search the name of the item replacing spaces w/ “_” marks and get the ID, the go to shops.cfg or whatever you have and search the item ID. If it comes up Negative, then it is not in a shop. Vice Versa

Read full topic

item.source: How do i add items to shops?

item.title: How do i add items to shops?
item.dc:creator: @darklord1 darklord1
item.description:
@darklord1 wrote:

add item at shop.cfg Yes and also go to item.cfg to change prices. Here is an example item: Code:

item = 15999 Money_Bags A_Cape_worn_by_people_with_money. XXXX XXXX XXXX 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500 500

This is the Item ID, Name, And Description (In that order)
Code:

item = 15999 Money_Bags A_Cape_worn_by_people_with_money.

The XXXX’s Represent the money costs and the 500’s are the stats

Posted on: November 10, 2009, 04:55:52 pmThere should be shops.cfg but if not I would go with shopbuyconfig.cfg

nope none of them i searched item.cfg and couldn’t find what u showed in example.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add items to shops?

item.title: How do i add items to shops?
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

wilddreams:

add item at shop.cfg

Yes and also go to item.cfg to change prices. Here is an example item:

item = 15999	Money_Bags			A_Cape_worn_by_people_with_money.			XXXX       XXXX       XXXX       500	500	500	500	500	500	500	500	500	500	500	500	500	500	500

This is the Item ID, Name, And Description (In that order)

item = 15999	Money_Bags			A_Cape_worn_by_people_with_money.

The XXXX’s Represent the money costs and the 500’s are the stats

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 04:55:52 pm[/size][hr]There should be shops.cfg but if not I would go with shopbuyconfig.cfg

Read full topic
